attributes.shortDescription: Lightweight sport climbing harness with 4 gear loops and belay loop rated to 23kN. Adjustable leg loops with buckles for perfect fit. Comfortable for multi-pitch routes with breathable mesh panels. UIAA and CE certified for maximum safety standards in technical climbing environments.
attributes.title: Apex Safety Climbing Harness
attributes.description: Professional climbing harness combining safety, comfort, and functionality for sport and trad climbing.
